welcome_message_body: Welcome to Madiun, Indonesia! Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful time discovering Madiun!

restaurants.name: Bluder Cokro
restaurants.description: Bluder Cokro is a bakery located in Madiun.
restaurants.address: Jl. Cokroaminoto No. 36, Madiun, Jawa Timur 63132
